description: This file defines a UserProvider class that manages user display name state, interacts with local storage service, and notifies listeners on updates.

classes.name: UserProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing user display name state with persistence.

methods.name: loadSettingsFromStorage
methods.description: Loads user settings from local storage and updates the display name.

methods.name: setDisplayName
methods.description: Sets a new display name, saves it to local storage, and notifies listeners.
